attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I live in an area that is not as attractive  to live in as a neighbouring area yet my council charges  a higher council tax  and for less amenities.
I wish the prime minister to look at the whole picture and cap areas that are using the council tax for extra funding .

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
